Hong Tan

I'm a master student at Shanghai Jiao Tong University, and I am honored to be supervised by Professor Yi Xiong.

I have a passion for great food and enjoy staying active. My personal best for a 5-kilometer run is 19 minutes. Now, I am taking time to reflect and grow. I also love connecting and engaging with people.

Currently, I focus on the following research topics: Drug discovery, Protein engineering.

tanhong818(at)sjtu.edu.cn Google Scholar GitHub WeChat Twitter ORCID
Please tell me your name and affiliation (current or past) when adding my wechat. Thanks!
